meanings.definition: The state or quality of being degenerate.
meanings.sent1: The degenerateness of his behavior was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The degenerateness of the old building was clear from the cracks in the walls.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his degenerateness in playing the piano always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: The degenerateness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over their heads.
meanings.sent5: The degenerateness of the forest after the fire left a lasting impression on the hikers.

meanings.definition: The process of declining or deteriorating in quality or character.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the degenerateness of the relationship became more and more apparent.
meanings.sent2: The degenerateness of the fruit was evident from its moldy appearance.
meanings.sent3: The degenerateness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The degenerateness of the city's infrastructure was a ticking time bomb.
meanings.sent5: The degenerateness of the painting revealed the artist's inner turmoil.
